title: 2009 Porsche Cayenne GTS For Sale With Just 63,000 Miles
description: There aren't many modern automobiles we would want in our garage as much as a manual transmission Porsche Cayenne GTS. It's a remarkable blend of utility, luxury, power, and control. Sometimes, the perfect example comes up for auction, and this one, in Nordic Gold Metallic that's up for ...

descriptionSummary: The Porsche Cayenne GTS with a manual transmission is a rare gem that combines versatility, opulence, and driving passion. When such a specimen surfaces at auction, as it has now, it's an opportunity not to be missed.

title: Mercedes-Benz's New Illuminated Grille Is a Design Statement for the EQ GLC
description: Following a teaser video released last month featuring Mercedes-Benz CEO Ola Källenius, Mercedes-Benz gave yet another sneak preview of the upcoming electric Mercedes-Benz GLC with EQ technology ahead of its Munich motor show debut. descriptionSummary: Mercedes-Benz has given a glimpse into its highly anticipated electric SUV, set to make its official debut at the Munich Motor Show. The vehicle's design and features are slowly being unveiled through discreet teasers from company executives.

description: AliExpress sellers come up with all sorts of wild ideas to advertise products on the site, but the rise of AI has given them some serious firepower. descriptionSummary: AliExpress sellers are pushing the boundaries of creativity with their advertisements, but a new trend using artificial intelligence has taken an unusual turn. Some have created eerily realistic AI-generated ads for absurd products, including Porsche-shaped backpacks that defies logic.

title: Unplugged Performance's New Cybertruck Wheels Make It Look Even Wilder
description: Tesla Cybertruck owners don’t need any help sticking out. In fact, many of them would probably rather fade into the background, given the vitriol thrown at the trucks by some people. Owners who don’t mind the spotlight and want more of it would be well served with these gold 24-inch wheels from ...

descriptionSummary: Tesla Cybertruck enthusiasts often find themselves in the midst of controversy, but for those embracing the attention, a statement-making upgrade is in order - enter these show-stopping gold 24-inch wheels.

title: Green-on-green 1971 Chevrolet Corvette LS6 convertible heads to auction
description: Today's Chevrolet Corvette ZR1 and ZR1X have taken "America's sports car" to new performance heights, but in the waning days of the golden age of muscle cars, enthusiasts were being catered to with cars like this 1971 Corvette convertible with the legendary LS6 big-block V8. Part of Mecum Auctions' ...
titleSummary: Rare '71 Corvette Convertible with Rare LS6 Engine Set for Highly Anticipated Auction Appearance
descriptionSummary: The Chevrolet Corvette ZR1 and ZR1X have raised the bar for performance, but back in the muscle car heyday, enthusiasts craved powerhouses like this 1971 Corvette convertible, boasting a mighty LS6 big-block V8, from Mecum Auctions.

title: Never-Before-Seen Sketches Show How Cool Volkswagen Wanted To Be
description: If you're a hardcore Volkswagen fan, you're probably aware of and interested in cars that the German automaker sold outside your home country. For such individuals, the shape in these never-before-published sketches shared to LinkedIn looks incredibly familiar, calling to mind Brazil's Volkswagen ...
titleSummary: "Volkswagen's Radical Retro Revival: Unveiling the Brand's Forgotten Cool Factor"
descriptionSummary: Volkswagen enthusiasts may be intrigued by models sold abroad. These newly unveiled sketches bear a striking resemblance to the Volkswagen Beetle models popularized in countries like Brazil, sparking curiosity among collectors and aficionados.

title: Why Canada’s Roads Are Getting Safer While U.S. Traffic Deaths Rise
description: The Insurance Institute for Highway Safety (IIHS) has released a new report showing that the United States is struggling to curb road deaths — while Canada is steadily pulling ahead. The study, done in collaboration with Canada’s Traffic Injury Research Foundation, reveals a 33% increase in U.S. ...
titleSummary: "Canada's Road Safety Gains Leave Neighbors in the Dust"
descriptionSummary: Despite progress made by its northern neighbor, the US continues to grapple with stubbornly high road fatalities, whereas Canada has been making steady strides in reducing traffic deaths, according to a new report from the Insurance Institute for Highway Safety.

title: BMW Launches Gen6 Electric Motor for Neue Klasse EV Rollout
description: BMW has officially started series production of its sixth-generation eDrive motor — a key   piece of its all-electric Neue Klasse platform. Built at BMW’s Steyr plant in Austria, the new motor will power the company’s upcoming wave of EVs, starting with the 2026 BMW iX3. This production ...
titleSummary: "BMW Unveils Cutting-Edge Gen6 Electric Powertrain for Upcoming Neue Klasse EV Lineup"
descriptionSummary: BMW has begun mass-producing its advanced sixth-generation electric drive motor at its Austrian factory in Steyr, marking a key milestone for its Neue Klasse all-electric platform. The new motor will propel BMW's upcoming lineup of EVs, starting with the 2026 iX3 model.

title: Hyundai Unveils Killer 2026 Santa Cruz Lease Deal for August
description: The 2026 Hyundai Santa Cruz is just one of three compact pickup trucks available on the market today. More of a lifestyle truck than an outright hauler, the Santa Cruz has sporty looks and drives like a car, but it's also more practical for active individuals and families who want a pickup that's ...
titleSummary: "Hyundai Lobs August Surprise with Sizzling 2026 Santa Cruz Financing Offer"
descriptionSummary: The Hyundai Santa Cruz is a stylish, car-like pickup truck designed for active lifestyles. Part cargo hauler, part adventure companion, this compact pickup balances style with substance for busy families and outdoor enthusiasts.

title: 2026 Lotus Emira Costs More For Less Power
description: Last month, Lotus announced that it was improving the Emira sports car for 2026, finally introducing the 400-horsepower Turbo SE trim after it was first announced in 2024. This will sit alongside the V6 SE and above the Turbo, which replaces the non-SE V6 as the cheapest Emira you can buy. After a ...
titleSummary: "Lotus Emira Prices Rise Despite Slower Performance in Latest Trim"
descriptionSummary: Lotus is upgrading its Emira sports car for 2026, introducing the Turbo SE model with 400 horsepower that was initially teased in 2024. It'll join the V6 SE and fill the gap left by the non-SE V6's departure from the lineup.

title: Hyundai Launches Attractive 2026 IONIQ 9 Lease Deal for August
description: Hyundai is on a roll with its line of EVs, which is growing every year. The largest one, the three-row 2026 Hyundai IONIQ 9, just might be its most attractive. descriptionSummary: Hyundai's electric vehicle lineup is expanding rapidly, with its flagship model, the three-row 2026 IONIQ 9, poised to make a lasting impression as a sleek and sophisticated iteration of the brand's Palisade SUV roots.

title: 2026 BMW M5 Touring Vs. 2026 Audi RS6 Avant: 5 Major Differences
description: Between the discontinuation of the previous-generation Mercedes-AMG E63 Wagon and the fact that BMW never made an M5 Touring for many years, the Audi RS6 Avant had the performance wagon segment all to itself for a while. But things are so much more interesting with a bit of competition, and the ...
titleSummary: "BMW M5 Estate vs Audi RS6 Wagon: The Ultimate Performance Family Haulers Face Off"
descriptionSummary: The Audi RS6 Avant once reigned supreme in the performance wagon market, but its reign was marked by a lack of challengers – at least until Mercedes-AMG revived its E63 Wagon and BMW finally brought back the M5 Touring.

title: Tesla awards Elon Musk $39 billion in additional shares
description: Tesla has awarded CEO Elon Musk 96 million additional shares, worth $29 billion. The gift aims to compensate for the loss of a $50 billion pay package from 2018 that was struck down by a court ruling last year, incentivizing Musk to stay in the CEO role until at least 2027, reports Reuters. Musk is ...

descriptionSummary: Elon Musk's compensation package has just received a significant boost: Tesla awarded its CEO 96 million additional shares valued at $29 billion, aiming to offset lost earnings and keep him at the helm through 2027.

title: 5 Changes Ford’s Making to Correct Recalls Costing It Billions
description: Ford has implemented several changes to its quality control processes due to extensive recall orders costing the company billions over the past five years. The automaker began these revisions in 2023, and while its 90 recalls in 2025 have already set the single-year record for any manufacturer, the ...
titleSummary: "Ford's Recall Reboot: A Multibillion-Dollar Effort to Fix Flawed Vehicles"
descriptionSummary: Ford has been intensifying efforts to strengthen quality control measures following a costly spate of recalls that have weighed heavily on the company's bottom line over the past five years. The revamp began in 2023 and is yielding record-breaking results.

title: Ultra-Rare McLaren Speedtail Heads To Auction With $250k In Options
description: McLaren’s Ultimate Series of models represent the pinnacle of the brand’s technological, performance, and design expertise. The McLaren W1 is one of the more recent additions to the series, but a few years before that, the brand launched the Speedtail. With three seats, an incredibly powerful ...
titleSummary: "Million-Dollar McLaren Rarity Hits the Block with Hefty Custom Upgrades"
descriptionSummary: McLaren's flagship Ultimate Series showcases the brand's mastery of innovative engineering, exceptional performance, and sleek design. The W1 marks its latest achievement, building on the success of earlier models like the groundbreaking Speedtail triathlete, a powerhouse with unparalleled capabilities.

title: Tesla Won’t Like New Sales Figures in Challenging European Countries
description: Tesla registrations fell in several significant European countries during July, including France, Denmark, and Sweden, for the seventh consecutive month. The electric automaker registered 1,307 new vehicles in France during July, down 27% year-over-year. In Denmark, Tesla sold 336 cars, ...
titleSummary: Tesla Faces Reality Check in Troubled EU Markets
descriptionSummary: Electric car registrations dipped sharply in key European markets like France, Denmark, and Sweden last July, marking the seventh consecutive monthly decline. Notably, French sales plummeted by a quarter to just over 1,300 units.

title: How Bryan Lagas and His Car Geeks Perfect the Analog Porsche Experience
description: Time for some frank car talk, friends. We can all agree that technology is zooming ahead at an unprecedented rate these days, with AI being the revolutionary buzzword of the moment. There's no doubt these developments will continue to make cars more efficient, more silent, more intuitive and, yes, ...
titleSummary: "Meet the Masters of Analog Revival: Restoring Porsche's Pure Driving Soul"
descriptionSummary: Let's cut to the chase: automotive innovation is accelerating at a breakneck pace, driven by cutting-edge technologies like AI. The result? Cars that are more fuel-efficient, quieter, and intuitively responsive than ever before.

title: Ford Maverick Crushing Hyundai Santa Cruz In Sales This Year
description: Ford and Hyundai’s sales figures for their smallest pickup trucks, the Maverick and Santa Cruz, were just released for July 2025 and the year as a whole—so far. As a reminder, these are the only compact pickups on the market, and they’re two of three unibody trucks (including Honda’s Ridgeline) ...
titleSummary: Ford Maverick Surpasses Hyundai Santa Cruz in Market Share Despite Tough Competition
descriptionSummary: The latest sales numbers for the smallest pickup trucks from Ford and Hyundai, the Maverick and Santa Cruz, have been revealed for July 2025 and the year to date. As market exclusive compact pickups, these models lead a unique trio of unibody trucks.

title: Lamborghini & Porsche Won’t Like This Lucid Gravity’s Quarter-Mile Time
description: Electric automaker Lucid’s Gravity Dream Edition SUV has raced out of the gates with a blistering quarter-mile time of 10.6 seconds at 140 mph that topped Lamborghini’s Urus Performante, Porsche’s Cayenne Turbo GT, Rivian’s R1S Tri-Motor Max, BMW’s iX M60, and Mercedes-AMG’s EQE53. The Lucid ...
titleSummary: "Lucid's Electric Muscle Car Smashes Quarter-Mile Record, Leaving Supercar Titans in Dust"
descriptionSummary: The Lucid Gravity Dream Edition SUV has made a scorching impression on the quarter-mile track, eclipsing several high-performance rivals with a record-breaking 10.6-second time at 140 mph. Its speed is truly electrifying.

title: Before the G63, There Was This Oddball AMG G-Wagon
description: The Mercedes-Benz G-Class wasn’t born out of luxury. Originally developed in the late 1970s for military use – most notably for the Shah of Iran – the Geländewagen was built to be durable, functional, and capable off-road. Political turmoil scrapped the original plan, but Mercedes chose ...
titleSummary: "Unlikely Ancestor of the G63: A Quirky Predecessor Emerges"
descriptionSummary: The iconic G-Class emerged from a utilitarian past, born in the 1970s as a rugged military vehicle designed for harsh terrain, including for the Shah of Iran's elite forces. Its durability and functionality paved the way for a luxury renaissance.

title: 2026 Grand Highlander Arrives, But 2025 Offers Better Value
description: Since arriving in 2023, the Toyota Grand Highlander has secured its place in the brand's US lineup as a family-focused, three-row SUV positioned above the regular Highlander. Built in Indiana and based on the TNGA-K platform, it offers more interior room, a usable third row, and multiple powertrain ...
titleSummary: New Arrival Outshone by its Predecessor in Terms of Price and Performance
descriptionSummary: The 2023 Toyota Grand Highlander is a versatile, three-row SUV that has quickly become a stalwart in the brand's US lineup. Its spacious design and various engine options cater to families' needs for comfort and capability.

title: Hyundai Ioniq 5 and Honda Prologue Break EV Sales Records in July
description: July was a huge month for electric vehicles in the U.S., and two standout models helped lead the way: the Hyundai Ioniq 5 and the Honda Prologue. Both compact electric SUVs posted their best-ever July sales, pushing their brands to new overall sales records and setting the tone for what could be a ...
titleSummary: Electric SUVs Sizzle: Hyundai's Ioniq 5 and Honda's Prologue Set New Sales Paces
descriptionSummary: Electric vehicle sales in the US reached unprecedented heights in July, with the Hyundai Ioniq 5 and Honda Prologue leading the charge as top sellers. Both compact SUVs set individual monthly records, driving their respective brands to historic highs.

title: Lamborghini’s First Personalized Temerario Glows in Grey and Blue
description: Lamborghini's shift toward electrified supercars continues with the introduction of the Temerario, the Italian marque's all-new plug-in hybrid coupe. The model represents the brand's departure from the Huracán and its long-serving V10 engine, which has been replaced by a more potent and efficient ...
titleSummary: "Lamborghini Unveils One-Off Masterpiece in Dazzling Iridium Hues"
descriptionSummary: Lamborghini is accelerating its electric supercar strategy with the arrival of the Temerario, a sleek new plug-in hybrid coupe that supplants the iconic Huracán. Underpinning this bold new chapter is a game-changing powertrain that eclipses the outgoing V10 engine in terms of potency and efficiency.

title: MIT’s Light-Only AI Chip Could Supercharge Electric Vehicles
description: Imagine an EV that doesn’t need a bulky cooling system for its brain. Imagine your car processing LiDAR data, high-res camera feeds, and driver monitoring in real time—without sipping a ton of juice from the battery. MIT’s new light-only AI chip, which swaps electrons for photons, might just pull ...
titleSummary: Revolutionary LED-Powered Microchip Puts Accelerated Electrics Within Reach
descriptionSummary: Meet a groundbreaking EV innovation: a revolutionary AI chip that harnesses light to process high-speed data, eliminating the need for bulky cooling systems and significantly boosting efficiency in advanced driving features.

title: Ford Bronco 60th Anniversary Edition Blends Past and Present
description: Introduced on August 11, 1965, as a 1966 model, the Ford Bronco was designed to bring the simplicity and excitement of the Mustang into a rugged, off-road-ready vehicle. It marked Ford's entry into what it termed the “sport-utility” space, a phrase that would later define an entire segment. For ...
titleSummary: Bronco at 60: Vintage Flair Meets Modern Muscle in Special Edition Model
descriptionSummary: Ford revolutionized the automotive landscape with the 1966 Bronco, blending the youthful energy of the Mustang with the capability to conquer rugged terrain, thereby pioneering the sport utility vehicle category in American car culture.

title: 2024 Bentley Continental GT Speed For Sale With Just 6,500 Miles
description: Rolls-Royce and Bentley are two of the undisputed forces in the "as opulent a car as money can get you" segment. titleSummary: "Barely Broken In: Ultra-Rare 2024 Bentley Continental GT Speed Seeks New Owner"
descriptionSummary: Luxury enthusiasts know Rolls-Royce and Bentley as powerhouses in high-end automotive excellence. The Bentley Continental GT has reigned supreme since 2003, available as both a sleek coupe and elegant convertible with spacious seating for up to four passengers.

title: Honda’s Anna Engine Plant Celebrates 40-Year Milestone
description: Honda’s Anna Engine Plant (AEP) celebrated 40 years of building engines and components for both foreign and domestic production on July 22nd. Located a stone’s throw from the Village of Anna, the facility has expanded from a mere 200,000 square feet with 94 employees in 1985 to a massive 2.8 ...
titleSummary: "Four Decades of Excellence at Honda's Anna Engine Manufacturing Facility Marked"
descriptionSummary: Honda's Anna Engine Plant marks four decades of engine manufacturing, having transformed from a modest site with 200,000 square feet and 94 staff in 1985 into a sprawling operation serving both domestic and international markets.

title: G-Power's Thousand-Horsepower BMW XM Copies Mansory's Homework
description: Not only does the BMW XM send a confusing message by being both an SUV and the first standalone M car since BMW's only production supercar to date, but the awkward bodywork, separated headlight clusters, and bulging taillights leave the aftermarket with very few options short of a rebody, and ...
titleSummary: "Tuning Titans Clash: G-Power Outdoes Mansory with its Thunderous 1,000-HP BMW XM"
descriptionSummary: The BMW XM presents a paradox: it's both an SUV and an M car, defying expectations. Its unusual design makes it a challenge for the aftermarket to create accessories without opting for a full vehicle transformation.

title: Ford Revises Tariff Hit Estimate Again - And It’s Not Pretty
description: Ford has updated its financial guidance again for 2025, noting that tariffs will dent profits by a $3 billion gross amount, up from $2.5 billion. The automaker incurred $800 million in tariff-related expenses last quarter, and its 2025 earnings before interest and tax (EBIT) are now $6.5 billion to ...
titleSummary: Ford's Revised Tariff Toll Tally Takes Another Unwelcome Turn
descriptionSummary: Ford has revised its financial outlook for 2025, citing a significant impact from tariffs on profits. Tariff-related costs jumped 20% to $3 billion, with $800 million incurred in the previous quarter alone. EBIT is expected to be $6.5 billion.

title: 2026 Chevrolet Colorado Updates Are Coming – But Should You Buy the 2025 Instead?
description: The Chevrolet Colorado received a significant refresh for the 2023 model year, but it was the 2025 lineup that brought more clarity to its positioning. This year, Chevrolet unified the engine across all trims – a simplification that streamlined the lineup and makes previously higher-output trims ...
titleSummary: "New Chevy Colorado on Horizon, but is it Worth Waiting for?"
descriptionSummary: For 2025, Chevrolet streamlined the Colorado lineup by standardizing its engine across all trims, eliminating previous distinctions between trim levels and creating a more cohesive and user-friendly model lineup.
